content.body: The current semantics of `InvokeCustomMatcher` don't work well for extractors due to the `SameValueZero` and `SameValueNonNumber` semantics on steps 1 and 3. I would expect that steps 1 and 3 would return `false` when _kind_ is `~list~`, since a `Foo(x)` is invalid if `Foo` isn't a valid matcher since an iterator is expected.
content.formatted_body: The current semantics of InvokeCustomMatcher don't work well for extractors due to the SameValueZero and SameValueNonNumber semantics on steps 1 and 3. I would expect that steps 1 and 3 would return false when kind is ~list~, since a Foo(x) is invalid if Foo isn't a valid matcher since an iterator is expected.
